wikipedia_page.main: Air Vice Marshal Alexander Vallance Riddell Johnstone,  (2 June 1916 – 13 December 2000), better known as Sandy Johnstone, was a Scottish airman. He served as a Royal Air Force squadron, wing and station commander during the Second World War and the commander of Commonwealth forces operating in Borneo during the Indonesia-Malaysia confrontation.

response: *Sandy Johnstone, 84, Scottish Royal Air Force air marshall.
